column3: Cannot operate/launch without it. Required for legal compliance, core infrastructure, or safety-critical features. Budget immediately (0-3 months).
Needed for quality, compliance, or scale. Professional services at user milestones. Plan within 6-12 months or triggered by growth.
Beneficial but timing is flexible. Marketing tools (wait for revenue), enhanced features, professional services (can DIY initially). Plan 12-24 months or revenue-triggered.
Speculative or far-future. Enterprise features, international expansion, significant team scaling. Consider only at 24+ months or major pivot.
